text:
@JhaSanjay But your supreme leader @RahulGandhi said that Govt unnecessarily spreading fear psychosis over #CoronaVirus through #Lockdown #COVIDー19 won't impact 99% people Let people roam free Did he not count you in 99% who won't get infected with this virus ?
Any way Get well soon
